FuncDef: This command sets the advertisement timer and indirectly sets the master down timer on the virtual router instance. The message-interval setting must be the same for all virtual routers participating as a virtual router. Any VRRP advertisement message received with an Advertisement Interval field different than the virtual router instance configured message-interval value will be silently discarded.

ParaDef.Info: The number of seconds that will transpire before the advertisement timer expires. Values-1 to 255. ParamDefault: Default- 1
Specifies the milliseconds time interval between sending advertisement messages. This parameter is not supported on single-slot chassis. Values-100 to 900.
